questions.question_text:
A company needs to store data from a recommendation engine in a database.

Which AWS service provides this functionality with the LEAST operational overhead?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Both DynamoDB and Neptune will work but the requirement is to have leave operational overhead and going by that DynamoDB will be the right option.

Selected Answer: C
Looks to me Neptune per this:

Amazon Neptune: Great for knowledge graphs (Wikipedia), fraud detection, recommendation engines, social networking

Selected Answer: C
I couldn't believe it at first but the correct answer is C - Amazon Neptune.

"Why use Amazon Neptune for a recommendation engine?
Graph-based databases are commonly used for recommendation engines as they allow you to traverse relationships between entities to find high-value recommendations."

Reference: https://aws.amazon.com/tutorials/recommendation-engine-for-games-amazon-neptune/

Selected Answer: C
I would say Neptune, as the graph database is probably the best for recommendation engine.

Selected Answer: B
Amazon DynamoDB is the only serverless database option among the choices

Selected Answer: B
B. Amazon DynamoDB

Selected Answer: B
B is answer

B
Amazon DynamoDB is a fully managed NoSQL database service that provides fast and flexible storage for applications. It is designed to provide high availability, durability, and scalability with low operational overhead. With DynamoDB, you don't need to worry about infrastructure management, data replication, or scaling the database as your data and workload grow.

In this scenario, the company can use Amazon DynamoDB to store data from the recommendation engine. DynamoDB is well-suited for scenarios that require fast and scalable storage, making it a good choice for storing data generated by a recommendation engine.

Selected Answer: B
In the context of storing data from a recommendation engine, DynamoDB is well-suited due to its ability to handle large volumes of data and high read and write throughput. It provides automatic scaling based on demand, eliminating the need for manual capacity management.

choices.A: Access to a technical project manager
choices.B: Access to a technical account manager (TAM)
choices.C: Access to a cloud support engineer

questions.question_text: Which benefit does AWS offer exclusively to users who have an AWS Enterprise Support plan?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Access to a technical account manager (TAM)

"With Enterprise Support, you get 24/7 technical support from high-quality engineers, tools and technology to automatically manage health of your environment. You will also get access to a Technical Account Manager (TAM) who will provide consultative architectural and operational guidance delivered in the context of your applications and use-cases to help you achieve the greatest value from AWS."

https://aws.amazon.com/premiumsupport/plans/enterprise/
Not C, it is B for sure

Is it should be A? 
https://aws.amazon.com/premiumsupport/plans/enterprise/

Selected Answer: C
C. AWS Business Support
"Minimum recommended tier if you have production workloads in AWS"

For Developer support plan is "Recommended if you are experimenting or testing in AWS."

https://aws.amazon.com/premiumsupport/plans/#:~:text=Minimum%20recommended%20tier%20if%20you%20have%20production%20workloads%20in%20AWS

Selected Answer: C
https://aws.amazon.com/premiumsupport/plans/

questions.question_text: Which AWS Support plan is the minimum recommended tier for users who have production workloads on AWS?

A global company’s customers are experiencing long load times for images that are stored in an Amazon S3 bucket on the company’s website.

Which AWS service will improve the load times for the customers?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Amazon CloudFront

"Amazon CloudFront is a web service that gives businesses and web application developers an easy and cost effective way to distribute content with low latency and high data transfer speeds. "
"Distribute content with low latency and high data transfer rates by serving requests using a network of edge locations around the world."

https://aws.amazon.com/cloudfront/faqs/?nc=sn&loc=5&dn=2

questions.question_text: Which option is a common stakeholder role for the AWS Cloud Adoption Framework (AWS CAF) platform perspective?

discussion.content: Answer is (B) CIO as per this quote from AWS site. "Common stakeholders include CIO, COO, CTO, cloud director, and cross-functional and enterprise-wide leaders."

Selected Answer: D
"The platform perspective focuses on accelerating the delivery of your cloud workloads via an enterprise-grade, scalable, hybrid cloud environment. It comprises seven capabilities shown in the following figure. Common stakeholders include CTO, technology leaders, architects, and engineers."

Reference:
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/whitepapers/latest/overview-aws-cloud-adoption-framework/platform-perspective.html

Selected Answer: D
The Platform perspective helps you build an enterprise-grade, scalable, hybrid cloud platform, modernize existing workloads, and implement new cloud-native solutions. Common stakeholders include CTO, technology leaders, architects, and engineers.

Selected Answer: D
D. Engineer

Selected Answer: D
Platform perspective helps you build an enterprise-grade, scalable, hybrid cloud platform, modernize existing workloads, and implement new cloud-native solutions. Common stakeholders include CTO, technology leaders, architects, and engineers.

Selected Answer: D
Platform

The Platform perspective helps you build an enterprise-grade, scalable, hybrid cloud platform, modernize existing workloads, and implement new cloud-native solutions. Common stakeholders include CTO, technology leaders, architects, and engineers.

Common stakeholders include CTO, technology leaders, architects, and engineers.

https://aws.amazon.com/cloud-adoption-framework/

Platform
The Platform perspective helps you build an enterprise-grade, scalable, hybrid cloud platform, modernize existing workloads, and implement new cloud-native solutions. Common stakeholders include CTO, technology leaders, architects, and engineers.

Selected Answer: D
Platform perspective helps you build an enterprise-grade, scalable, hybrid cloud platform, modernize existing workloads, and implement new cloud-native solutions. Common stakeholders include CTO, technology leaders, architects, and engineers.

Selected Answer: A
In the AWS Cloud Adoption Framework (AWS CAF), the common stakeholder role for the platform perspective is the Chief financial officer (CFO). The platform perspective within AWS CAF focuses on the financial aspects of cloud adoption, including cost management, budgeting, and financial governance. The CFO plays a critical role in ensuring that the organization maximizes the value of the cloud while maintaining cost control and financial oversight.
